'Galway' (, ), or the 'City of Galway' (), is a city in Ireland. It is in the
West Region and the province of Connacht. Galway City Council is the local
authority for the city. Galway lies on the River Corrib between Lough Corrib and
Galway Bay and is surrounded by County Galway. It is the fourth most populous
city in the state and the sixth most populous on the island of Ireland.
